TopicTitle: What Happened to the Minecraft Forums?

Articles.Content:
Lately, the Minecraft forums has become a dump. (More than usual, that is...)

I\'ve reported at least seven different topics today, all involving posting in the wrong section. One person even posted his server topic twice (in the wrong section) because the first one received no comments.

Oddly enough, nobody sees the giant 'DON\'T POST SERVER TOPICS HERE' stickied at the top of the page.

Half of the topics are 'H0W D0 1 M1N3 4 F1SH??!!?' or something like that.

At least, the amount of hoax threads has dropped dramatically.

/endrant

Minecraft has a lot more people playing it so it\'s bound to have more noobs.

Minecraft has a lot more people playing it so it\'s bound to have more noobs.

True. But, I still think they could use a lot more mods, perhaps 2 for each subsection. Right now they only have five (I think?) moderating the entire place.
